text: Jorge Mendoza Parrado (born June 15, 1972 in Barcelona) is a goalball athlete and track and field athlete from Spain. He has a disability: he is blind and is a type B1 goalball player. He played goalball at the 1996 Summer Paralympics. His team was third. He was as the 2000 Summer Paralympics in Sydney, Australia. He threw the discus and javelin. == References == Category:Spanish goalball players Category:Spanish discus throwers Category:Living people Category:1972 births Category:Paralympic bronze medalists for Spain Category:Sportspeople from Barcelona Category:1996 Summer Paralympics Category:2000 Summer Paralympics Category:Sportspeople with disabilities, type B1 Category:Sportspeople with disabilities, type T11 Category:Spanish javelin throwers
title: Jorge Mendoza
